(5:10) 21-L.Tomlinson right tackle to DAL 1 for 1 yard (93-A.Spencer).

(4:34) 21-L.Tomlinson right guard for 1 yard, TOUCHDOWN. The TD gives Tomlinson his ninth straight season with 10 or more rushing TDs, an NFL record. The TD is No. 136 of his career, tying him with Emmitt Smith for most in a single decade.
10-N.Kaeding extra point is GOOD, Center-50-D.Binn, Holder-5-M.Scifres.
